name: FIFA: Road to World Cup 98
overview: Conquer fierce defenders and defeat entire nations on your quest to compete in World Cup 98. Featuring 172 International teams from 6 zones and 16 International stadiums. Responsive player and ball control. New motion captured players and moves. Detailed stats for over 4500 players. 5 ways to compete: World Cup 98, Friendly, League, Penalty Kick Shootout and Training Mode. Edit teams and players to create your own dream team.
